metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6821 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ff_mpv_common_init function in libavcodec/mpegvideo.c in FFmpeg before2.7.2 does not properly maintain the encoding context, which allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (invalid pointer access) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via crafted MPEG data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6821` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:2.8.3-1
libav-tools - 7:2.8.3-1
libavcodec-extra - 7:2.8.3-1
libavcodec-ffmpeg-extra56 - 7:2.8.3-1
libavcodec-ffmpeg56 - 7:2.8.3-1
libavdevice-ffmpeg56 - 7:2.8.3-1
libavfilter-ffmpeg5 - 7:2.8.3-1
libavformat-ffmpeg56 - 7:2.8.3-1
libavresample-ffmpeg2 - 7:2.8.3-1
libavutil-ffmpeg54 - 7:2.8.3-1
libpostproc-ffmpeg53 - 7:2.8.3-1
libswresample-ffmpeg1 - 7:2.8.3-1
libswscale-ffmpeg3 - 7:2.8.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:2.8.3-1').
